headline: Mimi's Smoked Salmon Chowder
name: Mimi's Smoked Salmon Chowder
description: This hearty smoked salmon chowder is pure Pacific Northwest comfort food, featuring potatoes, salmon, herbs, and spices in a creamy broth.
recipeIngredient: 6 cups chicken broth or vegetable broth
8 ounces smoked salmon, cut into 1/2 inch pieces

recipeInstructions.text: In a large stockpot over medium-high heat, combine butter, olive oil, onion, garlic, and celery. Cook for 8 to 10 minutes, or until onions are transparent. Sprinkle flour over the mixture and stir well to make a dry roux. Gradually add chicken broth and stir until slightly thickened. Stir in the potatoes, dill, tarragon, thyme, and paprika. Reduce the heat to medium, cover, and simmer for 15 minutes.
Stir in salmon, wine, lemon juice, hot sauce, salt, and pepper. Simmer over low heat, uncovered, for 10 minutes.
Mix in half-and-half and continue to simmer for 30 minutes, stirring occasionally. Do not let the chowder boil after adding half-and-half. Serve hot.
